gw.api.graph.print

Class ColoringDotFormatter<T extends Object>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.graph.print.ColoringDotFormatter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DotFormatter<T>

    public class ColoringDotFormatter<T extends Object>
extends Object
implements DotFormatter<T>
    A decorating DotFormatter that colors nodes and/or edges.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Object

        Class

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DotAttributes getAttributes(Object node)
      Adds any configured fill color to the node.
      DotAttributes getAttributes(Edge<Object> tEdge)
      Adds any configured color to the edge.
      String getNodeId(Object node)
      Returns the node id.
      void setEdgeColorer(Function<Edge<Object>,Color> edgeColorer)
      Sets the function for coloring the edges. The function may return a null, in which case no color is set.
      void setNodeColorer(Function<Object,Color> nodeColorer)
      Sets the function for coloring the nodes. The function may return a null, in which case no color is set.
